course.fullname: How to Pray the Holy Rosary
course.summary:
Learn to pray the Holy Rosary with confidence through this comprehensive course. Whether you're a complete beginner or returning to this beautiful devotion after time away, this course will guide you step-by-step through the prayers, mysteries, and meditation techniques that make the Rosary such a powerful form of prayer.

The Rosary is a Scripture-based, Christ-centered prayer that has transformed the lives of countless Catholics throughout history. Through this course, you'll not only learn the mechanics of praying the Rosary, but also discover how to enter into deep meditation on the life of Jesus Christ.

What you'll learn:

  • The history and spiritual significance of the Rosary
  • All the prayers used in the Rosary
  • How to use rosary beads
  • The four sets of Mysteries (Joyful, Luminous, Sorrowful, Glorious)
  • Meditation techniques for deeper prayer
  • How to build a daily Rosary habit

Includes quizzes to help you memorize the prayers and mysteries!
